00034   class RangeState {
00035   public:
00036     enum StateType { STEADY, SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED, SPLIT_SHRUNK };
00037     RangeState() : state(STEADY), soft_limit(0), transfer_log(0),
00038                    split_point(0), old_start_row(0) { return; }
00039 
00040     void clear() {
00041       state = STEADY;
00042       timestamp.clear();
00043       //soft_limit = 0;  NOTE: this should not be cleared
00044       transfer_log = split_point = old_start_row = 0;
00045     }
00046 
00047     size_t encoded_length();
00048     void encode(uint8_t **bufp);
00049     void decode(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp);
00050 
00051     int state;
00052     Timestamp timestamp;
00053     uint64_t soft_limit;
00054     const char *transfer_log;
00055     const char *split_point;
00056     const char *old_start_row;
00057   };

00059   std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &, const RangeState &);

00064   class RangeStateManaged : public RangeState {
00065   public:
00066     RangeStateManaged() { }
00067     RangeStateManaged(const RangeState &rs) {
00068       operator=(rs);
00069     }
00070     RangeStateManaged& operator=(const RangeState &rs) {
00071       state = rs.state;
00072       timestamp = rs.timestamp;
00073       soft_limit = rs.soft_limit;
00074       if (rs.transfer_log) {
00075         m_transfer_log = rs.transfer_log;
00076         transfer_log = m_transfer_log.c_str();
00077       }
00078       else
00079         transfer_log = 0;
00080       if (rs.split_point) {
00081         m_split_point = rs.split_point;
00082         split_point = m_split_point.c_str();
00083       }
00084       else
00085         split_point = 0;
00086       if (rs.old_start_row) {
00087         m_old_start_row = rs.old_start_row;
00088         old_start_row = m_old_start_row.c_str();
00089       }
00090       else
00091         old_start_row = 0;
00092       return *this;
00093     }
00094     
00095     void set_transfer_log(const String &tl) {
00096       m_transfer_log = tl;
00097       transfer_log = m_transfer_log.c_str();
00098     }
00099 
00100     void clear_transfer_log() {
00101       m_transfer_log = "";
00102       transfer_log = 0;
00103     }
00104 
00105     void set_split_point(const String &sp) {
00106       m_split_point = sp;
00107       split_point = m_split_point.c_str();
00108     }
00109 
00110     void clear_split_point() {
00111       m_split_point = "";
00112       split_point = 0;
00113     }
00114 
00115     void set_old_start_row(const String &osr) {
00116       m_old_start_row = osr;
00117       old_start_row = m_old_start_row.c_str();
00118     }
00119 
00120     void clear_old_start_row() {
00121       m_old_start_row = "";
00122       old_start_row = 0;
00123     }
